snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday declined to review a ruling that found Los Angeles County liable for pollution runoff into Southern California rivers after big rain storms, in a decision hailed by environmentalists who brought the case....

headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Denies Petition to Hear Los Angeles Stormwater Case
headline.main: Supreme Court Denies Petition to Hear Los Angeles Stormwater Case

lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday declined to review a ruling that found Los Angeles County liable for pollution runoff into Southern California rivers after big rain storms, in a decision hailed by environmentalists who brought the case.
